DPR Minta Jokowi Pilih Orang Berpengalaman Bidang Hukum Jadi Dewas KPK
04 Nov 2019, 11:28 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) akan memilih langsung Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK untuk pertama kalinya. Wakil Ketua DPR Azis Syamsuddin meminta Jokowi menunjuk orang yang berpengalaman di bidang hukum.
"Cari orang yang berpengalaman di bidang hukum, punya experience di bidang hukum. Bisa saja mantan KPK, bisa saja mantan komisioner, tentu punya pengetahuan dan experience dan pengalaman yang cukup di bidang hukum," kata Azis di gedung DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019.
Azis tak mempermasalahkan jika nantinya Dewas KPK diisi orang-orang dari partai politik asal dinilai berkompeten dan berpengalaman. Ia mengatakan tak ada pembatasan latar belakang Dewas KPK.
"Sepanjang punya pengalaman, experience, dan punya akuntabilitas yang cukup dalam dunia hukum, dan bisa menganalisis daripada UU tersebut," ujar Azis.
Dia meminta semua pihak mengawasi proses pemilihan Dewas KPK untuk menghindari konflik kepentingan. Menurutnya, UU Nomor 19/2019 tentang KPK sudah mengatur proses pemilihan anggota Dewas.
"Kita harus menjaga, seluruh elemen masyarakat, seluruh komponen bangsa harus menjaga, tidak ada conflict of interest di dalam penunjukan dalam hal pelaksanaan UU. Sudah diatur di UU, (Dewas) ditunjuk oleh pemerintah," tegasnya.

DPR Asks Jokowi to Choose Experienced People in the Legal Field to Become KPK's Board of Trustees
Nov 04 2019, 11:28 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) will elect the KPK Board of Trustees (Dewas) for the first time. Deputy Speaker of the DPR Azis Syamsuddin asked Jokowi to appoint someone with experience in the legal field.
"Look for people who are experienced in the field of law, have experience in the field of law. It could be a former KPK, could be a former commissioner, of course have sufficient knowledge and experience and experience in the field of law," Azis said at the Parliament building, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019.
Azis does not matter if the KPK Dewas will be filled with people from political parties as long as they are considered competent and experienced. He said there were no restrictions on the background of Dewas KPK.
"As long as they have experience, experience, and have sufficient accountability in the world of law, and can analyze rather than the Act," said Azis.
He asked all parties to oversee the election process of Dewas KPK to avoid conflicts of interest. According to him, Law No. 19/2019 concerning the KPK has governed the election process for Dewas members.
"We must maintain, all elements of society, all components of the nation must protect, there is no conflict of interest in the appointment of the implementation of the Act. It is regulated in the Law, (Dewas) appointed by the government," he said.
